🔹 Starting the Game Each player begins with a hidden fleet of ships placed on a grid.
Ships can be of varying lengths and are positioned before the match begins.
🎯 Objective Be the first to completely destroy your opponent’s fleet by choosing smart attacks or strategic defenses.

⚔️ Attack Select a tile on your opponent’s grid to launch an attack.
If a ship occupies the tile, it takes damage.
If no ship is present, the attack misses.
Damaged ships remain in place but can no longer be moved.

🛡️ Fortify (Defend) Instead of attacking, reposition any undamaged ship on your grid.
Use this to avoid predicted attacks or strengthen your defense.
Only undamaged ships can be moved. Once a ship is hit, it’s locked in place. `

🏁 Victory Condition The game continues until one player entire fleet is destroyed.
The player with remaining ships is declared the winner.
💡 Tips Balance aggression with defense – sometimes it’s better to move than attack. Pay attention to enemy patterns and protect your high-value ships.
